description:
Carl combines two of my favorite things: hairy men and big dicks!

“At home,” he said, “it’s cold all the time.”

“So all that body hair must keep you warm!”

“Yeah,” he laughed. “I guess so!”

“Does it get pretty thick when you don’t trim it?”

“Yeah,” he said again. “I get pretty furry.”

And then, of course, there is his cock... it’s huge!

“Do you get a lot of compliments on it?” I asked. “Your cock, I mean?”

He got a little embarrassed. “Yeah,” he said. “Never had any complaints!”
title: Carl
